title: Smart Data Models - WindContPitchAngleIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Pitch angle control model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.5.8.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindContPitchAngleIEC

WindGenTurbineType3IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 3 model with which this pitch control model is associated. Default: None

dthetamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum pitch positive ramp rate (d). It is type dependent parameter. Unit = degrees/sec. Default: 0.0

dthetamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum pitch negative ramp rate (d). It is type dependent parameter. Unit = degrees/sec. Default: 0.0

kic.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power PI controller integration gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kiomega.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed PI controller integration gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kpc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kpomega.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Speed PI controller proportional gain (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

kpx.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pitch cross coupling gain (K). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

thetamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum pitch angle (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

thetamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum pitch angle (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

ttheta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pitch time constant (t). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0
